# [Interview #1112: JordanCon 6 - Cosmere questions, Entry #32](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1112#32)

#### Question

What does Glys look like?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Uhhm, RAFO. [smiles] Looks like a big RAFO.
